original_title: OMG! I Fucked My Bratty Student
overview: Teaching is a difficult job but all the struggles are worth it when you realize you've finally been able to reach out and "touch" a student! Young, tight teens with a naughty disposition and an eagerness to learn all they can about sex ed, put the moves on their older teachers. We're sure they'll pass with flying colors!
title: OMG! I Fucked My Bratty Student
